author: holiman
content: <@!489256758989029405> requested a state-test regarding selfdestructs in relation to EIP-2929. I made one, which tests different variants of hot/cold accounts, and even precompile beneficiaries. Available here: https://gist.github.com/holiman/b505a0c001dc1c0eeaaca705c903d235 . Passes on geth, besu and OE cc <@!403707149043105803> <@!531145505355464708> <@!393119312350543872>
